column5: My place has a great view & is walking distance to the beach, art and culture, restaurants and dining, and family-friendly activities. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the coziness & it's convenient location on North Beach. Walking distance to local attractions.. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).  In addition, the city of Corpus Christi does require a 9% tax to be collected which is not included in your original price with Airbnb.
